about_the_game:
BUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUGS
SHOOT THE BUUUUUUUUUUGS - is hardcore arena survival game, collect crystals, kill bugs and have REAL FUN

- Endless bugs spawn
- Collecting crystals
- Nice soundtrack
- AK 47
- Beautiful graphic

In the near future, you landed on another planet, but the landing was fatal. The only thing you saw was a small ruined settlement and a cemetery. There is no one left here, this is not a planet for people, this is a planet of BUGS. It's good that you have your kind Kalashnikov assault rifle - AK47 with you. Now you must try to survive until reinforcements, and collect as many crystals as possible for the further survival of your civilization. Can you - Unknown Player survive and save the human race? This we will find out in the second part of the arena survival adventure game SHOOT THE BUUUUUUUUUUGS 2.

BUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUGS

name: SHOOT THE BUUUUUUUGS

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7, 8, 8.1, 10
  • Processor: Intel Pentium 4 2Ghz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512 MB video memory
  • DirectX: Version 10
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7, 8, 8.1, 10
  • Processor: Intel Pentium 4 2Ghz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512 MB video memory
  • DirectX: Version 10
